nav.div: Rapid River Schools » News » What's New » COVID-19

img.title: COVID-19

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

img.p: Last night (3/12/2020), Governor Gretchen Whitmer and State Superintendent Michael Rice announced the closure of all Michigan K-12 school buildings, public, private and boarding, starting Monday, March 16 through Sunday, April 5.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

img.p: Limited staff may be in the buildings, but the buildings will not be accessible to the general public.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

img.p: We ask that all staff and students take home their personal belongings and school books from their lockers, classrooms and office/desk spaces at the end of the day on Friday, March 13.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

img.p: While we are off, we want to make sure our facilities staff is able to get into each building and perform a deep, disinfecting clean in all areas of our building.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

img.p: We are still working through the details of this announcement. We know that there are a number of unanswered questions, and we are working to be able to provide answers. We will continue to communicate with staff and families through our school messaging system as more information is available.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
